pgDev.bukkit.DisguiseCraft.api

Class PlayerDisguiseEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.event.Event
      • pgDev.bukkit.DisguiseCraft.api.PlayerDisguiseEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cancellable

    public class PlayerDisguiseEvent
extends Event
implements Cancellable
    This cancellable event is called whenever a player is to be disguised either by command or another plugin.
    Author:
    PG Dev Team (Devil Boy)
